channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Wow That's Amazing
channel.desc: Get ready for incredible experiments and mind-bending puzzles to impress your friends with Wow That?s Amazing. Owain and Tilly are here to explore epic science tricks to try at home and showcase brand-new technology innovations from around the world! In this episode, find out how rubber bands can make the perfect bouncy ball, meet Spot, the dancing robot dog, pick up handy tips to make art pop off the page, and try a watery trick that won?t dampen your day.
